#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <math.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        vector<pair<int,int> > b;
        int r;
        long long int s=0;
        for(int i=0;i<10;i++)
        {
            cin>>r;
            b.push_back(make_pair(r,i));
        }
        sort(b.begin(),b.end());
        vector<pair<int,int> >::iterator it = b.begin(),end = b.end();
        if(it->second==0)
        {
            if(it->first==(it+1)->first)
                ++it;
        }

        if(it->second==0)
        {
            s=1;
            s = s*(pow(10,(it->first)+1));
        }
        else
             while(it->first!=-1)
            {
            s = s*10 + it->second;
            it->first = it->first -1;
            }
        cout<<s<<endl;
        /*for(;it!=end;++it)
        {
            cout<<it->first<<" "<<it->second<<endl;
        }*/
    }
}
